quote_last: Get off school bus at home
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_first: But there were more bad things than good things. And one of them was that Mother didn't get back from work til 5.30 pm so I had to go to Father's house between
quote_last: and 5.30 pm because I wasn't allowed to be on my own and Mother said I didn't have a choice so I pushed the bed against the door in case Father tried to come in.
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon
